description:
This app lets your webOS device act as a "remote control" for a SageTV Media Center setup. With this app you can control a single Media Center or any number of clients or extenders connected to it. In order for it to function you must have the jetty web server and the sagex-api installed on the server you connect to. This app now works with placeshifters and extenders.

If you have issues please send me an email using the "Email" button on the Help page instead of posting a 1 star review of your problem. 

Also on the Help page is a link to the Beta version, which will usually contain more features than this version (until this version is updated to the beta version).

Note that your device has to be able to connect to the server whether it's over Wi-fi or you forward the ports through your router and use a 3G or 4G connection.
